name: Wave Function Cat Labs
description:
We are a bit late to add a description, but here it is!

This game is inspired by a procedural content generation algorithm called wave function collapse and the Schrödinger's cat experiment. In the experiment, the outcome is only decided at the moment the experiment is observed. In the game, map tiles are (re)generated by looking at them, so you move through an ever-changing environment. The goal is to save as many cats as possible wile being chased by an enemy. If you find yourself trapped by a wall just look again, maybe you'll find a way. But be careful every time you'll look at a cat there is a chance it will die. You can throw glowing mines to keep the enemy at bay and to lock down areas, so they won't regenerate when being looked at.

We only had one and a half day to work on this, but we hope you'll still enjoy it :>

If you are a fellow jamer write us a comment and well play your game <3
